unnormalised: Regarding your query on investment options, please note that investments in the Indian stock market are subject to market risks. normalised: Regarding your query on investment options, please note that investments in the Indian stock market are subject to market risks. As of first january two thousand and twenty four, mutual funds had an A-U-M of rupee forty trillion. Investing in equities may provide potentially high returns but also comes with a higher risk as compared to fixed deposits. Individuals can start investing with as little as rupees five hundred through S-I-P-s, but thorough research and consultation with a financial advisor are highly recommended before investing any amount, be it rupees ten thousand or rupees one hundred thousand. Always remember to consider your risk appetite.
